jhelp.gui

Class WaitingGlassPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • jhelp.gui.WaitingGlassPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class WaitingGlassPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Glass pane you can add for draw something over a frame while a long operation waiting to finish before give the hand to the user

    Last modification : 23 avr. 2009
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
    JHelp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addWaitingGlassTo

        public static WaitingGlassPane addWaitingGlassTo(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Add a waiting glass plane to a frame
        Parameters:
        frame - To add the waiting glass plane
        Returns:
        The added waiting glass pane to be able initialize and manipulate it (Don't use it for an other frame, for an other frame, you have to use this method again)
